name: Mad Science (Dim-x)
description:
EDIT - fixed varying jump height bug

Help the little lab rat escape from an insane scientist who's eager to test his discoveries. 

W,A,D / Arrow Keys to move and jump

M to mute music

Made for Godot Wild Jam #19

Music/SFX/Graphics/Scripting by Dim-X

My first game AND first  jam. had fun! hope you will too
